tips.text: Using the "Load backup" button you will be able to restore a Mod install backup.
This version supports the new Mod Activation Queue.
Click here to remove a single Queued or Completed mod activation.
Click here to remove all the Queued activations from the list.
Click here to purge all the Completed activations.
This version fully supports the new CDN download system.
Click here to check the latest version tips.
This version supports the new Abstain endorsement state (click once to Endorse and click again to Abstain).
Fixed an issue with the XML script compiler preventing scripts to properly compile for plugin-less games.
